item.title: Links for Tue 1 Jan 2008
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Hackszine.com: Eavesdropping on Bluetooth headsets – I wish I could say that I’m surprised by this, but I’m not. With so many Bluetooth headsets already out there that are subject to this it is unlikely that we’ll be safe anytime soon, even if this was fixed today. Tags: bluetooth security wireless headset mobile
item.content:encoded:
• Hackszine.com: Eavesdropping on Bluetooth headsets – I wish I could say that I’m surprised by this, but I’m not. With so many Bluetooth headsets already out there that are subject to this it is unlikely that we’ll be safe anytime soon, even if this was fixed today.
    Tags: bluetooth security wireless headset mobile

item.title: TRS-80 Bluetooth
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: This is just awesome, TRS-80 Bluetooth. We had a TRS-80 Model 100 when I was a kid. If I remember right that was the first modem I ever used, speeding along at 300 baud! It was a very portable machine though. It had a usable keyboard and didn’t require a suit case to carry it. […]
item.content:encoded:
This is just awesome, TRS-80 Bluetooth. We had a TRS-80 Model 100 when I was a kid. If I remember right that was the first modem I ever used, speeding along at 300 baud!

It was a very portable machine though. It had a usable keyboard and didn’t require a suit case to carry it. Battery life was good and it used regular 4 double AA batteries, so extra batteries were easy to find

The down side, for long term storage we used audio tape. That’s a storage format that I don’t miss.
